title: VP Harris Lies During Interview: “We Have A Secure Border”
itunes:title: VP Harris Lies During Interview: “We Have A Secure Border”
description: Vice President of the United States Kamala Harris has declared that the U.S.-Mexico border is "secure" in an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press." VP Harris went on to blame the problems at the border on "the deterioration that happened over the last four years." Let's not mention that President Biden effectively made her the "border czar" a year and a half ago. And let's also not mention that the Biden Administration is on pace for their second record-breaking year in a row for number of border encounters. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break down the VP's statements and give their takes on the border crisis. This and more today on Sekulow.
